In observation mode, units don't fire at the enemy even if they're in sight range

Repair System







{#20380} serves as an exceptional scout for the Confederation, adept at monitoring enemy troop movements over vast distances. It is equipped with a stealth module, enabling {#20380} to evade enemy fire effectively. Additionally, its vulnerability scanners pinpoint weaknesses in enemy armor, providing valuable information to allied forces and making enemy units an easy target. With {#20380} on the field, no one can elude its vigilant surveillance.
In standby mode, {#20380} activates its scouting scanner, gradually increasing the sight range. It refrains from approaching detected enemies to initiate an attack. Scanning halts if {#20380} sustains damage, utilizes an active ability, attacks, or begins to move.
Vulnerability Scanner
Scans the designated area for {#81}4[-] sec, revealing all hidden units. Identifies weaknesses in enemy armor, increasing the damage dealt to them by {#81}{0}%[-]. This debuff on enemy units persists throughout the scanning process and remains for {#81}{1} sec.[-] after it concludes.
Specify scanning point
Holographic camouflage
When {#20380} is attacked, it creates a holographic projection that cloaks {#20380}, making it appear like its surroundings for {#81}{0} seconds[-]. While invisible, {#20380} can attack and use its active ability. However, upon nearing enemy units or structures, the invisibility fades, although the reduction in damage from direct attacks persists, lowered by {#81}{1}%[-] until the ability's duration concludes.

ARS 3rd Generation Recovery System







The all-purpose assault vehicle has a Gatling machine gun, able to engage ground and air targets from a considerable distance. The machine gun accelerates during a sustained attack, multiplying the rate of fire and damage. The hull-mounted grenade launchers tear lightly armored enemy units to shreds while a smoke screen diminishes the impact of enemy assaults. Once Wolverine grabs his victim, it won't escape.
The rate of fire gradually increases when you keep attacking enemies for extended periods. You can achieve a maximum damage bonus of {#81}+200%[-]. However, once you stop firing, this bonus will decrease quickly.
Carnage
Launches a barrage of {#81}10[-] frag grenades into the designated area spanning up to {#81}{0}[-] cells. Units positioned at the center of the target area endure concentrated damage from multiple grenades.
Wall of Smoke 
Launches six smoke grenades toward a group of enemy units aligned with the primary weapon's target. The smoke screen diminishes the firing accuracy of enemy units by {#81}{0}%[-] and remains effective for {#81}{1}[-] sec.

{#41055} — {0}
HERO BLUEPRINTS HOT OFFERS
Purchase at a discount!
{#83}UPDATE:[-] "CHANGING THE CLAN SYSTEM"
"{#83}MAIN INFO[-]

Now the maximum number of clan members has been reduced from 50 to 25 players. The reason for this is to:
• {#83}Improve matchmaking. [-]
More clans in the game are going to improve matchmaking.
• {#83}Easily collect clan supplies.[-]
The fewer players in a clan, the fewer points are required to get clan supplies. The perfect number of players in a clan is 25 players.
• {#83}Prepare for clan wars.[-]
We've plans to add a new game mode named Clan Wars.

{#83}Changes to the clan system:[-]
• Joining clans is allowed from two profiles simultaneously.
• Clan leaders with 25 members or fewer in a clan get each clan supply case twice.
• In a clan, the leader obtains an additional 3% of clan influence.
• In a clan, deputies obtain an additional 2% of clan influence.
• Clans with 25 or fewer members require significantly less WP to open clan supplies.

{#83}During the transition period (until December 8, 2022)[-]
• Clans may keep the same number of members, but playing with a 25-player clan is much more profitable.
• Players preserve their clan status when leaving, expelling, creating, or joining another clan, but the activity is lost when leaving a clan. The number of clan changes isn't limited."
{#41144<30>}
{#41144<50>}
{#41144<100>}

New Schedule for Game Modes
"Commanders, starting tomorrow, the start time for the Blitz Tournament will change, as well as the start time for the 2x2 and 3x3 game modes.

2x2 and 3x3 game modes changes
• 2x2 and 3x3 game modes will start every hour. Now you'll enjoy playing these modes two times more often!

Blitz Tournaments changes
• Blitz Tournaments now start at the 30th minute of every hour.
• Pauses between Blitz Tournaments won't be more than 2 days.
• Each Blitz Tournament will last up to 5 days.

With these changes, the schedule will look like this:
• 00:00 - Tournament
• 00:15 - 2х2
• 00:30 - Blitz Tournament
• 00:45 - 3х3
• 01:00 - Tournament
• and so on.

The new schedule will be tested to make sure that the changes do not have a negative impact on matchmaking for all game modes.

What do you think about the news, commanders? Share your thoughts in the comments!"

The Black Market gets updated daily.

Introducing Premium 2.0 — Now with More Rewards and Greater Profits!
"Premium continues to be one of our most popular items in the shop, providing players with exceptional bonuses. We have significantly enhanced the Premium experience and are delighted to offer you Premium 2.0!

The Premium benefits from before are still the same and have not been changed:

• +50% to battle reward 
• +5 stars for PvP
• Showing an enemy and a map before battle
• Name highlighting in chat
• +2000 credits per the first win of the day

In addition to the existing Premium benefits, pleasant new bonuses have been introduced:

• The second line of daily rewards. 
Now, every time you log in to the game, you can get not only one standard reward but also one premium reward. Please be attentive! The common reward line still allows you to redeem the rewards you missed. However, you’re not allowed to redeem missed rewards in the premium reward line. So we advise you to log in to the game daily to claim all your premium rewards. 

• In the replay mode, you’ll have a special button allowing you to switch on or off the fog of war. 
With the fog of war being switched off, you’ll be able to easily spot what your opponent is doing. Since you can track every enemy move, you’ll have a pretty decent chance to better understand their tactics and strategy in general.

• A unique avatar frame. 
Frames are a new way of customizing your profile, which will make it more distinctive compared to other players. The frame will only be active while you have Premium status, but you can choose to disable it whenever you wish.

• Enjoy a 5% reduction in upgrade research time.
Improve your troops even faster! With Premium status, you can save over 40 hours of upgrade research time in just one month. It's important to note that this time reduction only applies to upgrades started during the Premium period.

• Introducing the new Premium Contract.
It offers an easy way for you to earn credits, golden credits, and four additional Permits, while playing the game for fun. The rewards you receive from the contract will depend on the league you're currently in. Additionally, if you're unable to complete the contract in a single day, your progress will carry over to the next day, ensuring that you don't miss out on any potential rewards.

• Premium status increases the Permit Limit by 4. 
This means that you can now participate in more competition battles, giving you more opportunities to enjoy the game and earn rewards.

• The time to complete an upgrade for free has been significantly extended from 3 to 30 minutes. 
In the past, players could complete an upgrade for free if there were 3 minutes left. However, with an active Premium status, you can now complete an upgrade for free if there are 30 minutes or fewer remaining.

Premium Cost Change

Now, Premium will be sold not for golden credits, but for real currency.
There will be available 3 options to extend your Premium:
• 7 days 
• 30 days 
• 90 days 
Your Premium days will be summarized as before.

Conversion of days of active Premium with compensation

As the Premium is now much more advantageous, the remaining time on players' profiles will be recalculated. If the remaining time is less than 30 days, the time won't change. The time starting from the 30th day will be reduced 3 times. Golden credits will compensate for the reduced time at a rate of 0.0004 golden credits per second.
For example:
• A player had 15 days — nothing has changed.
• A player had 36 days — 32 days left and compensation of 138 golden credits.
• A player had 60 days — 40 days left and compensation of 691 golden credits.
• A player had 90 days — 50 days left and compensation of 1382 golden credits.
• A player had 180 days left — 80 days left and compensation of 3456 golden credits.

Thank you for playing and being a part of our community, Commanders!"
"Greetings, commanders!
We’d like to know what you think about some game aspects. Please spend just a couple of minutes answering our questions. Your feedback will greatly improve the gameplay of Art of War 3."
The Summer Heat Event
"From the 26th of July, 9 AM UTC till the 7th of August, 9 AM UTC, in PvP, Tournament, Blitz Tournament, and Skirmish battles, there'll be dropping cryocapsules. Collect them to complete the progress of holiday contracts and obtain tokens, golden credits, Hero Blueprints, and Skill Cards!

{#80}How does it work?[-]

You'll have 5 contracts available. To complete them, you'll need to collect a certain number of cryocapsules, varying from 50 to 1000.
Cryocapsules complete the contract progress, and it happens for all the contracts simultaneously. All players have the same contracts.

{#80}Rewards you can obtain[-]

• Collect 50 cryocapsules: 275 golden credits, 525 tokens, 350 common Hero Blueprints, 125 common Skill Cards.
• Collect 125 cryocapsules: 550 golden credits, 1050 tokens, 80 rare Hero Blueprints, 40 rare Skill Cards.
• Collect 250 cryocapsules: 1100 golden credits, 2100 tokens, 50 epic Hero Blueprints, 25 epic Skill Cards.
• Collect 500 cryocapsules: 2200 golden credits, 4200 tokens, 200 common and 75 rare Skill Cards.
• Collect 1000 cryocapsules: 4400 golden credits, 8400 tokens, 100 rare and 50 epic Skill Cards.

{#80}How to get cryocapsules[-]

• Collect them on the battlefield.
Cryocapsules will be dropped on the battlefield if all battle participants are of the rank 5 or higher.
Cryocapsules are available for all game modes, except for training battles and campaign missions.
[i]The number of cryocapsules in battles depends on the game mode:[/i]
1. 1x1, 2x2, 3x3 — 5 cryocapsules
[i]Furthermore, every victory in the 1x1, 2x2, or 3x3 mode will grant you bonus cryocapsules.[/i]
2. Tournament — 5 cryocapsules
3. Skirmish — 3 cryocapsules
4. Blitz Tournament — 6 cryocapsules

• Cryocapsules were added to the competition reward line. If you have VIP Access unlocked, the number of cryocapsules granted for a win will be 2.5 times higher for Skirmish and Blitz Tournament battles, and 3 times higher for Tournament battles!

[i]The number of cryocapsules in reward lines depends on the game mode as well[/i]
1. A bonus for a Tournament battle win — 6 cryocapsules
2. A bonus for a Skirmish battle win — 2 cryocapsules
3. A bonus for a Blitz Tournament battle win — 4 cryocapsules

Keep in mind that you needn't necessarily win if you're playing the Mexican Slaughter to complete the reward line. Just avoid being the worst player in a battle, and that will be enough.
For instance, having played Skirmish without a single defeat, you'll get 40 cryocapsules. In the Tournament mode, you'll get 120 cryocapsules for 20 wins. If you couldn't win all the battles, you can opt for the Competition Rerun. The reward line progress will be saved, and you'll be able to play 20 battles once again.

• Watching ads
You can watch ads on the contract window and get a bonus cryocapsule.
• Each in-game purchase grants bonus cryocapsules. If the good you buy is costly, you'll get a significant number of cryocapsules. The bigger the purchase, the more bonus cryocapsules you'll get.

{#80}How to get cryocapsules in battles?[-]

On a mini-map, a cryocapsule is highlighted with a yellow marker, and a yellow circle on the ground indicates the drop point. This is the point where a cryocapsule appears in 30 seconds. When it appears, the fog of war gets revealed around it for a short period. Moreover, now cryocapsules appear both on land and water.

To capture a cryocapsule, you need to move your land unit to it. The base capture speed is 30 seconds. Boosts and the Container Capture Speed Commander Skill influence the capture of cryocapsules.

{#80}When do cryocapsules appear?[-]

PvP
• Starting from 10-14 min to 42-55 min
Skirmish
• Starting from 10-13 min to 24-29 min
Tournament
• Starting 10-14 to 42-55 min
Blitz Tournament
• Starting 6-8 min to 14-16 min

Got questions? Leave them in the comments!"
"Commanders, the update makes available the following changes:

{#80}Matchmaking improvement in Tournaments and Blitz Tournaments[-]

We've changed matchmaking so that you can play competitions more comfortably. Now the system will pick an opponent that suits you better according to their skill. If you perform well, we'll find you an appropriate rival to make it entertaining for you to play against them. The better you play, the more competitive players you'll fight with.

[i]Moreover, earlier, matchmaking considered win rate of both tournament and PvP battles. Some players made their PvP win rate lower in bad faith. It allowed them to play against weaker opponents at the start of the competition. Now it won't be an issue anymore.[/i]

{#80}Base rewards were increased for all game modes[-]

From now on, you'll be getting even more green credits for wins!
The increase in the reward for Tournaments and Blitz Tournaments is more significant than for PvP and Skirmish.
For example, in the Steel League, the rewards for PvP were increased by 15%, for Tournaments — 20%, and for Blitz Tournaments — 25%.
In the Star League, the rewards were increased by 8% for PvP, 33% for Tournaments, and 43% for Blitz Tournaments.

{#80}2 new maps were added[-]

• In the middle of nowhere
• Thaw
 
The maps are available for the 1x1, 2x2, and 3x3 modes.

Any questions? Go to the comments section!"

{#80}Matchmaking was improved in tournaments and 1x1 blitz tournaments.[-]

If the rank difference is significant, the battle won't start. The overall number of aforementioned battles won't exceed 1%. The current change regards only several starting battles of the competition. The rest of the battles will follow the regular matchmaking rules."

The tournament matchmaking is better now
"Hello, commanders!

This summer, we released two updates that improved our matchmaking in tournaments and blitz tournaments. But what exactly was changed? Let’s find it all out!

Earlier, the matchmaking system was massively dependent on your [i]current win rate[/i], which is your win percentage over the last 50 PvP and tournament battles. Some strong players lost PvP battles on purpose to make their current win rate lower and consequently play against weaker opponents in tournaments. Thus, strong players enjoyed winning streaks, and average players had a hard time losing battles.

To address the issue, we introduced [i]the cumulative tournament win rate[/i]. Players couldn’t see it, and its calculation is based on the tournament battles’ results. The formula used is pretty sophisticated — it even excludes intentionally lost tournament battles. Apart from that, in each tournament, [i]the current win rate of an ongoing tournament[/i] is calculated.

At the beginning of a tournament, the matchmaking considers the cumulative tournament win rate. But as the tournament approaches its end, the current win rate of an ongoing tournament plays a more significant role. Last tournament battles are organized solely based on the current win rate of an ongoing tournament. So, if you complete a tournament almost without losses, you’ll play against such skilled players in the last battles.

There’s a separate count of win rates for tournaments and blitz tournaments. It means your successful play in blitz battles won’t affect the tournament matchmaking, and the other way around.

Things that won’t be counted during matchmaking:

• {#80}Player rank[-]. Opponents are chosen from one league. Yet, you may play against an opponent from a neighboring league with a difference of no more than one rank.
• {#80}Unit and building upgrade[-]. It doesn’t affect directly but influences indirectly. As a rule, players with better upgrade levels have a higher win rate. That’s why there’s still an indirect influence on matchmaking.
• {#80}Commander Skills upgrade[-]. As previously stated, it’s not directly considered but influences indirectly.

All in all, the new matchmaking system considers how good a player is during an ongoing tournament and in tournaments in general. If you’d like to win a tournament, in the majority of cases, you’ll play against more or less equal opponents.

Still have questions? Leave them in the comments!"
Developer’s Diary. Lobby
"Greetings, Commanders! Today, we’re delighted to announce some new things that are going to be released in the future.

The next major feature the developers are currently working on is [i]a lobby[/i].
{#80}The lobby[-] is a handy tool to help players make up teams to play coop modes. It’s just a separate room where you can have all your friends, clanmates, or random guys ready to play a particular mode. For instance, 2x2, 3x3, or training.
The Art of War game will introduce two lobby types — a training lobby and a lobby that allows players to gather allies to play coop battles.

{#80}The training lobby[-] is, in fact, an advanced version of the current training. It works the way it is now — you can get there if you’re invited by a player who created a lobby. 
In the lobby, there’ll be an option to select a mode and a map. Also, you’ll be able to pick up participants for the upcoming battle.
Moreover, all lobby members will enjoy a chat. It’s supposed to be used to discuss tactics before a battle starts, or just have fun babbling.
We’ll add the Observer feature in the future. With this, players will have a unique chance of watching other players play, which is absolutely remarkable! Also, such an option will make it possible for players to create their own community tournaments — customized battles that will be played according to the players’ rules.

The lobby to get your allies all in one place to play coop battles is an evolution of the invite system to team battles like 2x2 and 3x3. Oh yes, now, you’ll be able to play a 3x3 NOT with some no-name guys from around the corner, but with your friends. You don’t even need to wait till all the players take seats. If you lack one player, the lobby will make everything for you and add a random commander from the battle waitlist. However, in this lobby, you won’t be able to either choose a map or select an enemy.

We’ll add the lobby to the game, and the whole thing will have two acts.
Act 1. The introduction of the training lobby
We do need it to test all the stuff related to the feature we’ve been working on so hard.
Act 2. The introduction of the competition lobby

Stay tuned for more!"
Support team. Who are they, and what can they do to help players?
"We receive hundreds of messages daily via support chat and social network messengers. Bug reports, technical queries, balance issues, plans — players write about everything. Despite tons of messages, every player gets a prompt response with helpful info.

[i]But who answers all these questions?[/i]

Bots, ChatGPT? No way! They are the Support Team members, just boys and girls like you who are knowledgeable about the game. They'll do their best to deal with each request carefully and help each player as quickly as possible.

Okay, that's clear. Let's get straight to the most frequently asked questions.

[i]Why can't the Support Team answer my question immediately?[/i]

There are a certain number of questions, and we answer them one at a time. Sometimes thousands of players write to us during the day. They all want for our immediate attention. So please try to give us as much information as possible in one message to avoid having to ask us again. If you send numerous messages before getting a response, you'll get back in the queue and have to wait longer for a response.

[i]Where can I get a faster answer? In-game chat or social media?[/i]

It doesn’t matter. Either way, the same people will answer. Avoid sending your message everywhere. It just takes us longer to process it.

However, there's a handy life hack.

If you have a payment-related question, write to the Support chat right in the game. It'll allow our specialists to check the account right away and obtain all the necessary info.
If you experienced a bug that required sending screenshots or videos, reach us on our social media.

In addition, try to describe an issue thoroughly. 
""The game doesn't work"" is not what we expect from you. The info is too vague, and our specialists aren't magicians to understand the case from its incomplete description.
""I can't enter the game. It all started today at 9 p.m. and still goes on. When I try to log in, I get an error with the following text. Here's a screenshot of it. My nickname is helpmeplease"" — this is quite an improvement. 

And, finally, you shouldn't contact Support just to discuss your private life or other off-topic matters. Remember that we try to answer every query you make, and figuring out the local weather or something makes the waiting time longer for other players. It's better to subscribe to our social media to find other commanders who might be more talkative about non-game topics.

Still have questions? Leave them in the comments!"
Prices have been increased for Thai players
"Despite significant currency fluctuations, the in-game store prices haven't changed for over two years. We tried to make prices for in-game items even lower than the actual currency rate. However, the situation has altered significantly, and we have to make necessary amendments to the prices.

By doing so, we clearly understand that the news is going to upset players, and they might show a negative attitude toward the price increase. However, even after the increase, the prices will still be lower than the actual currency rate. All the actions we take are crucial for the development of the game, which unites us all.

The updated prices will take effect from the 10th of October.

Thank you for your support and understanding."

Android devices version 5.0 and below are no longer supported
"Attention Commanders! We will soon discontinue support for devices running Android version 5 and below. 
 
Mobile devices and their software change frequently, so we regularly analyze the operating system market and decide which ones to support. 
 
The Android 5.0 operating system was released in 2014, so unlike more recent versions of Android, it prevents us from using the latest key features of our game. In addition, Android 5.0 is no longer supported by Google, so it doesn't receive security updates. 
 
{#80}What should I do?[-] 
 
We recommend that you update your Android operating system to version 5.1 or buy a new phone with a 5.1 operating system at the earliest. 
 
{#80}How to check and update your Android version[-] 
 
You can view your Android version number in the Settings app, as well as the date of the security update and the date the Google Play system update was installed. You'll receive a notification when a new software version is available for your device. Alternatively, you can check for updates yourself. 
 
{#80}To know your Android version[-] 
 
• Open the Settings app on your phone. 
• Scroll down the screen and select About phone - Android version. 
• Check the Android version, Android security update, and build number. 
 
{#80}To download the latest Android updates[-] 
• When you get the notification, open it and tap Update. 
• If you hide the notification or your device is not connected to the Internet, follow these steps: 
• Go to your device settings. 
• Tap System - System Update. 
• You'll see the updated status. Follow the instructions on the screen. 
 
Any questions? Leave them in the comments! 
Like if you still have a push-button old-school phone!"
Halloween event
"Commanders, get ready! You're in for 12 days of pumpkin madness! But which rewards will you receive? Trick or treat? It's up to you! 
 
From October 25, 9 p.m UTC to November 6, 9 p.m. UTC in Tournament, Blitz and Skirmish battles, mysterious pumpkins will appear. Collect pumpkins to complete your Holiday Contracts and get Tokens, Golden Credits, Hero Blueprints, and Skill Cards! 
 
{#80}How is it different from the summer event?[-] 
• In competition battles, many more pumpkins appear. For example, in the Zombie Apocalypse Blitz tournament, up to 60 pumpkins can appear in just 1 battle. 
• To complete the Contracts, you will now also need to collect more pumpkins. But don't worry! The number of battles and the time to complete the Contracts remain the same. 
• In PvP battles, pumpkins won't appear during the battle, but are given for winning. We kept fighting against the “quitters”, and now they have a crushing defeat. No more pumpkins for losing! 
• Extra Contract for those who have Premium. Simply collect 250 pumpkins per day and get Gold and Tokens! If you fail to complete the Contract during the day, its progress will carry over to the next day. 
• Pumpkins in battles have good or bad effects. When you pick up pumpkins, you not only complete your contracts, but you also get one of the random effects right during the battle. This could be either an increase in armor for units around the pumpkin, or a zombie squad that will tear your fighters to shreds. These effects can be found in all “pumpkin” modes, namely Skirmish, Tournament, or Blitz Tournament. 
• Progressive line of rewards in Competitions. Thus, the 5th reward in the Tournament will bring you 70 pumpkins, the 10th - 90, the 15th - 110, and the 20th - 130 at once! In addition, after every 5th reward, the number of bonus rewards also increases. 
 
{#80}How does it work?[-] 
There are 5 Contracts available to you, where you need to collect a certain number of pumpkins - from 500 to 10000. 
 
Pumpkins complete the counters of all Contracts at the same time. The terms of the contracts are the same for all players. 
 
{#80}What rewards can you get?[-] 
• Collect 500 pumpkins: 275 Golden Credits, 525 Tokens, 350 common Hero Blueprints, 125 common SC. 
• Collect 1500 pumpkins: 550 Golden Credits, 1050 Tokens, 80 rare Hero Blueprints, 40 rare SC. 
• Collect 3000 pumpkins: 1100 Golden Credits, 2100 Tokens, 50 epic Hero Blueprints, 25 epic SC. 
• Collect 6000 pumpkins: 2200 Golden Credits, 4200 Tokens, 200 common SC, 75 rare SC. 
• Collect 10000 Pumpkins: 4400 Golden Credits, 8400 Tokens, 100 rare SC, 50 epic SC. 
 
{#80}How to get pumpkins?[-] 
• Collect them on the battlefield. 
Pumpkins will appear on the battlefield if all players of rank 5 or higher are in battle. 
Pumpkins are available in all game modes except PvP, training battles, and campaign missions. In PvP, pumpkins are only granted for victory. Each victory will bring you 40. 
 
The number of pumpkins available in battle depends on the game mode: 
- Tournament - up to 20 pumpkins if you win 
- Skirmish - up to 12 pumpkins if you win. 
- Blitz Tournament - up to 100 pumpkins when playing FFA6. 
 
• Completion of the Competition line of rewards will bring you additional pumpkins. Having VIP will increase the quantity of pumpkins for winning by 3 times! 
The number of pumpkins in the reward lines also depends on the game mode. 
- In one free cell of the Tournament's line of rewards - 60 pumpkins 
- In Skirmish - 20 pumpkins 
- In the Blitz Tournament - 40 pumpkins. 
You do not have to win the FFA4 or 6 Blitz Tournaments. The reward line will get partially completed even if you win the second or third place. 
 
For example, completing Skirmish without a single defeat will give you 400 pumpkins. In the Tournament, you can get 1200 pumpkins by completing the entire line of rewards. If you fail to win all the battles, you can restart the Competition. The progress in the line of rewards will be saved, and you will be able to play 20 more battles. 
 
• Watching Ads 
On the contract screen, you can watch ads and get 10 extra pumpkins. 
 
• Every purchase in the store brings bonus pumpkins. 
The more expensive the item, the more pumpkins you get! 
 
{#80}How to collect pumpkins in battle?[-] 
On the mini-map, pumpkins are highlighted with a blue marker. In addition, pumpkins will appear both on land and sea. 
To capture a pumpkin, you need to bring a unit to it. The base capture speed is 30 seconds. Boosts and the “Container Capture” skill affect the capture speed of pumpkins. 
 
Still have questions? Leave them in the comments!"

Where are the containers located? What's the best way to play on the new maps? What Easter eggs can you find? 
 
siegsauer66 is behind the microphone. Follow the button."

New Maps
"The following maps have been added to the game — Grand Canyon, Caesar's Islands, and Port of Bjorn.

The Grand Canyon map is a tiny 100x100-cell-sized map with one out in the center to allow more dynamic and breathtaking fights.

The Caesar's Islands map is a big 120x120-cell-sized map, having a tremendous sea area for epic naval battles.

The Port of Bjorn map is well-suited both for land and sea battles. The map size is 120x120 cells.

If you'd like to know more about the maps, please check the review made by siegsauer66"
"Autumn Cleaning" Update
"Commander!
We're glad to release the Autumn Cleaning update.

Why do we call it a ''cleaning''? Well, the update is going to tidy up the house of Art of War 3. The main goal of it is to enhance the current game mechanics, make the gaming process even more convenient, and fix the map balance.

Let's see what's inside the update:

{#80}Gameplay[-]

[i]In the settings, turning off the auto-rotation of fighters after attacking the target[/i]

More than a year ago, we added a feature allowing players to auto-rotate fighters. Beginners had a cool time easily controlling aviation. However, for experienced players, it was an issue as they couldn't manage avia units as before.

Now, in the settings, you can disable the auto-rotation of fighters, so that everybody can customize them to their liking.

[i]Commander Skills now affect mines[/i]

Now, the {#7844} Commander Skill will decrease the incoming damage down to 10% when the max upgrade level is reached.
The {#1796} and {#1797} Commander Skills will increase the damage dealt by land and sea mines up to 20% when the maximum upgrade level is reached.
The change shall mostly affect high-ranked players.

[i]The battle logic of Armadillo and Caiman when mining has been enhanced[/i]

Earlier, when you tried to mine an area with several units at once, they might glitch. You won't experience such an issue anymore.

{#80}Matchmaking[-]

[i]Matchmaking will prioritize clan members over others in 2x2 and 3x3[/i]

As soon as the 3x3 mode was out, players were asking us to allow them to play it with their friends and clanmates. To cut the waiting time a bit, we've come up with a temporary solution. Now, you'll have a higher chance of being on the same team as your clanmates when playing 2x2 and 3x3 modes. For this, players must be of more or less the same rank, and the win rate gap shouldn't be more than 30%. Also, the ping parameter should be appropriate for all battle participants. If all the requirements are met, you stand a chance to get on the same team as your clanmate. We remind you that the chance to get on the same team has indeed increased, but that doesn't mean it's 100%.

[i]In 2x2 and 3x3 modes, matchmaking has been improved[/i]

In team battles, finding enemies is based on the strongest players in each team, not the total sum of players' grades. Earlier, for matching to succeed, the rank difference shouldn't be more than 30% and 3 grades.
Now, the gap shouldn't exceed 2 grades. For instance, if the maximum grade in your team is 23, the maximum grade you're allowed to play against is 25. The change will make top Star League players have a little bit more 3x3 battles where the system fails to find opponents for them. But the overall percentage of such cases won't be more than 7%.

{#80}Maps[-]

[i]Map balance in 2x2 and 3x3 modes[/i]

Our analysis results strongly suggest that Star League Resistance players tend to win more often on some maps, so we have lowered the chance of having these maps during battles. Here they are: {#61085}, {#61088}, {#61056}, {#61069} and others.

[i]In the 3x3 mode, the points where teams are located have been changed. Now, the strongest player faces up against the strongest one[/i]

We've rearranged players' bases so that the player with the highest grade is located in front of their counterpart. For example, on the {#61073} map, the strongest player's base stands out at the front lines, while weaker players are located in the rear. Such a change will exclude the case when a powerful rival destroys weaker players first.

[i]On the {#61065} map, containers have been moved away from the sea[/i]

The map features two separate bodies of water, so naval units were solely produced to get all water containers captured. Fighting with the fleet was impossible.

What do you think of these changes, commander? Let us know in the comments!"
{#7281}. Why do you need them?
"Many commanders think the {#7281} are useless, but is it really true? Let’s find it out!

The {#7281} are required for:
• changing the reward in any crates — free, ad, personal, and clan ones. Also, in the line of competition rewards.
• changing contracts

{#80}What are the player’s benefits?[-]

Changing the reward helps you get the reward you really want now. Eager to upgrade a unit, but you’ve received boosts instead of some credits? Just change the reward in a crate, and here it is — you have a new random set of rewards of the same value. Keep in mind that the previous set of rewards won’t be available. Each subsequent change will require more {#7281}. In total, you can change your reward three times.

{#80}And what about the contracts?[-]

If you change your contacts, you’ll save the most significant resource you have. It’s your playing time. Let’s assume you’ve been given the ‘’Destroy 4 Zeusses with Dragonflies in Tournament and PvP battles’’ contract. But you haven’t upgraded the Dragonfly unit. What should be done then? Should you wait till your enemy gives up and passionately head forward to the base to eliminate some tanks left with no control? Well, if yes, how many battles will it take? Maybe just one battle. Maybe even 20! By changing a contract, you’ll be able to pick up the task you can complete easier. Value the time, commander!

And what’s your opinion about the {#7281}? Is it a precious reward or junk?
Let us know in the comments!"

Game Balance Change
"Greetings, Commanders!
The current update changes the balance of units and Heroes.

{#80}The base value of helicopters' production time was increased.[-]

- {#1010} 30 -> 35 seconds
- {#1040} 32 -> 37 seconds

Now, mass production of helicopters won't be that effective as players receive more time to get ready for the helicopters' invasion.

{#80}The base value of {#1035}'s firing accuracy on the move was 15% increased.[-]

{#1035} is useful when defending and holding control points, but has low efficiency on the move due to its lack of firing accuracy. Now, the issue is resolved.

{#80}The {#1005} production cost in resources was decreased from 130 to 120.[-]

Stats data clearly shows that players rarely use the {#1005} unit because it does good against armored vehicles and buildings but loses to infantry and is useless against aviation. To encourage players to make {#1005} more often, we'll lower its production cost.

{#80}Starting from the 21st grade and on, an upgrade of the explosion radius of the {#1008} is increased from 2.0 to 2.3 cells.[-]

On higher grades, {#1008} lacked damage dealt, and it was not so battle-efficient. We've increased the explosion radius of its rockets upon upgrade. Now, {#1008} deals about 7% more damage than earlier.

{#80}The base value of the fuel consumption for fighters was 7% decreased.[-]

We've made it lower to allow lower-grade players to use aviation units more efficiently.

{#80}The base and upon upgrade values of the movement speed of {#1019} were 10% decreased.[-]

After having analyzed the stats and battle replays on how skillful commanders applied the unit, we've noticed that {#1019}, due to high movement speed, escaped battles to cool down the ability almost without taking damage. It made {#1019} invincible when controlled by an experienced commander. After making its movement speed lower, {#1019} will still be useful in battle and even more controllable for rookies since it won't go ahead of the entire army.

{#80}The base and upon upgrade values of the movement speed of {#1037}'s missiles were 7-10% increased.[-]

Sometimes {#1037}'s missiles could not catch Vertex fighters when using {#1240} and {#1325} boosts. Now, the mentioned case will be a rare occasion.

We'll go on monitoring the game balance.

Good luck in battles, commanders!

{#2569}"
Enemy Surrender Notification. Changes
"Greetings, commanders!

Earlier, the notification indicating an enemy surrendered appeared one minute after the enemy had pressed the {#676} button. Now, this notification pops up immediately, and the battle will last 3 minutes instead of 5 after an enemy gives up.

These changes may affect the completion of some contracts, so we’ll analyze the stats concerning the current contracts and make them easier if necessary.

What do you think about the change? Share it in the comments!

{#2569}"
Hero Upgrades Rebalanced
"Greetings, Commanders!

The most recent update changes the upgrades of Heroes. From now on, initial upgrades have gained some extra strength. This allows players to use heroes with an incomplete upgrade level more efficiently. The introduced changes are easier to spot when it comes to the first-level heroes like {#1017} and {#1047}.

For instance, {#1017}. The 6th upgrade of the {#40509} granted +165 {#620}. Now, the value has increased, and it is +197 {#620}.
We have taken additional {#620} from later upgrades and redistributed them to earlier ones.

Things that remained unchanged: base and upon upgrade parameters of Heroes, {#714}, and {#710}.
The rebalance affected only {#620}-related upgrades, {#620} restore, and both passive and active abilities.

What do you think about this? Share your thoughts in the comments!

{#2569}"
Оплата на iOS для пользователей из РФ
"С 10 марта 2022 года пользователи из России не могут покупать цифровые товары в App Store с помощью карт Visa и Mastercard, выпущенных в РФ. 
 
Мы подготовили подробную инструкцию с актуальными способами оплаты, которые позволят вам приобрести игровые товары в магазине АОВ3. 
 
Переходите по кнопке!"
The battle start after a player fails to join an FFA 4-6 battle
"Hey, commanders!

In the Free For All mode, you won't be able to spoil the battle for other players that easily.

Earlier, a battle could be canceled if one of its participants failed to join the battle server. There were numerous reasons for it, varying from an unstable internet connection to quitting a battle on purpose while it was being initiated. As a result, those players who managed to connect to a battle lost their time, as the battle was canceled anyway.

Now, a battle won’t be canceled if a player fails to enter it when it begins. The player who is late will still have a chance to get into the battle if their HQ is not destroyed. In the future, we plan to activate the deployment mode for those who missed the battle start.

The introduced changes will significantly decrease the number of deliberately interrupted battles. For instance, when a player changes his or her mind and quits the battle that is being arranged. Now, regardless of whether one of the commanders has cowardly deserted, the battle will still be fought. Also, if someone calls you or the connection is bad, just finish your phone call or restart the device, and reconnect to the battle then.

Who's calling you when it's not the right time? Let us know in the comments!

{#2569}"
«Christmas trees» New Year's event
"Commander, get ready! 14 days of New Year's frenzy time await! From December 20, 9 AM UTC, to January 3, 9 AM UTC, collect Christmas trees in battles, complete the progress bar of New Year's contracts, and receive tokens, golden credits, Hero Blueprints, and Skill Cards!

{#80}How do I get Christmas trees?[-]

1. Collect them on the battlefield.

Christmas trees will be spawned on the battlefield if all battle participants have attained the 5th grade or higher. On the battlefield, Christmas trees are available in all game modes except PvP, training battles, and campaign missions. In PvP, Christmas trees are only granted for victory after a battle. Each victory will bring you 12.

2. Get Christmas trees from the competition's line of rewards.

The more victories you have, the more Christmas trees will be waiting for you in the reward line. For instance, as the first Tournament reward, you'll get 14 Christmas trees, and for the 20th, you'll obtain 40! With VIP, you'll get more Christmas trees.

3. Watching ads.

On the contract screen, you'll be able to watch an ad and earn 4 extra Christmas trees.

4. Every purchase made grants bonus Christmas trees.

The more expensive the in-game items are, the more Christmas trees you'll get.

You can find out more about the «Christmas trees» event and ask related questions on our social media. Tap the button below!"

"{#80}What exactly should players expect in 2024?[-]

• Training lobby
Select any mode and map, and invite friends or random players. Hone your skills in training battles and arrange your customized battle. Expect the lobby to come out in January!

• Rating lobby
It's a more convenient system to gather players for all team modes — 2x2, 3x3, and skirmish. Invite friends and win! We plan to release the rating lobby by the end of spring.

• New heroes
The Confederation and Resistance players are waiting for a new hero to stand out on the battlefield. Please take a look at the new heroes in our trailer! We plan to release the new heroes by the end of April.

• The observer mode for a training lobby
This mode lets you watch player battles online and make customized tournaments. This is when players organize fighting according to their liking.

• Modifications of units
Players will have a chance to equip units with certain modifications that allow them to change their characteristics and appearance. For instance, the Scout modification for {#1034} will increase sight range and movement speed but make it more vulnerable.

{#80}What else?[-]

• New ""Wasteland"" setting for maps
• New blitz tournaments
• New maps
• Even more new heroes!

{#80}And what will happen after all of that?[-]

We're eager to add team competitions to the game, like 2x2 and 3x3 tournaments and 2x2x2 blitz tournaments. It's a lot more fun to compete with friends and get rewards! However, we must make necessary amendments on many game levels before making it. We'll release the feature by the end of 2024.

The list of upcoming novelties still needs to be completed, and we'll tell you more about some other additions at the beginning of the new year.

What do you await the most? Let us know in the comments!

{#2569}"
Plans 2024
Protect the Account
"Greetings, commander!

Sometimes, we’re getting requests from players in the fashion of “My account is stolen. Help me get it back!’’
What exactly should you do to avoid being tricked by scammers and protect the account? Here are some tips to help you keep the account safe.

{#80}Never give your credentials to other players![-]

Brothers, sisters… Whatever. Even if your cat asks you to let him play the game, you must not do that.
We’re aware of the cases where some players allowed others to play using their accounts. They hoped to partake in numerous battles, receive a medal, and earn extra in-game credits. But is it really worth it if you risk losing the account forever? You spent so much time upgrading it, so losing it in such a silly way won’t definitely pay off all your efforts.

Not to mention the License Agreement, which clearly stated that:

The User shall NOT

• temporarily transfer and completely dispose of the Rights regarding the Account or post information on the intention to perform such actions on any resources;
• use the Account of another User, including with his/her consent, as well as make attempts to gain unauthorized access to the Account of another User.

If you ignore it, the account is likely to be blocked.

{#80}Add or update methods to restore access to the email linked to the Play Games or Game Center profiles.[-]

An additional phone number or email will help you out when the game account is in danger. They might aid you in blocking access to the game account for other guys, and even restore access to the account if you forget your password. 

{#80}Enable two-step verification[-]

This might be vital to protect the account from being hacked, even if a scammer steals your password.

{#80}Use unique and safe passwords[-]

Using the same password for several websites isn’t safe at all. If one of the accounts is hacked, others might meet the same fate, and a scammer will steal important data from your accounts.

{#80}Who in the world will think about stealing the game account?[-]

Evil-minded players will try to get your credentials in different ways. Here are just a few of them:

“Wanna get some free gold? I’mma make it now!”
“I buy packs 4 times cheaper. I’m the developer, you know!” 
“I can make you a tournament winner. Bro, you still got no medal!”

Sounds good, ain’t it? However, the only free cheese is in the mousetrap. Sending your credentials to such a “developer” will lead you to lose the account and start the game from the very beginning. Don’t get involved with such “developers” to keep the account safe.

Keep your friends close and accounts closer, commander!"
Prices have been increased for players:
"Currently, the dollar exchange rate against the national currency is rising considerably.

The change will result in higher in-game prices in national currency for users of Android devices.

By doing so, we clearly understand that the news is going to upset players, and they might show a negative attitude toward the price increase. However, even after the increase, the prices will still be lower than the actual currency rate. All the actions we take are crucial for the development of the game, which unites us all.

Thank you for your support and understanding."
{#382} is activated as soon as the player enters battle
"Greetings, commanders!

Some players do not always join the battle on time, and there are many reasons for this: poor internet connection, a broken VPN, a cat, or a wife distracted the player, or the player literally forgot to join the battle.

If you miss the {#382}, it takes a long time to build the base, and it is extremely difficult to win such a battle. Furthermore, in team battles, a late player will discourage his allies.

Now, {#382} is no longer triggered for all players at once at the beginning of the battle. However, it is available to each player individually when they first join the battle. For example, if you lose your connection during the loading process and then reconnect, you will get the {#382} when you enter the battle. This allows you to quickly build a base despite the connection delay. 

Still have questions? Leave them in the comments!"
What are the developers working on right now?
"• The training lobby will be available to all players on January 29th!
• The next major feature will be Heroes. Core testers have been testing them for quite a while. Soon, we will share information about the use of Heroes, their active and passive abilities, and their names. The release of Heroes is planned for the first half of spring.
• Rating Lobby. Invite your friends and clanmates to play 3v3! It will be available during the second half of the spring.
• The training lobby will get an observer mode in the future. This is an important feature that allows you to broadcast customized tournaments.
• The Art Team has updated the old flags. Some of them are already available in the beta version of the game. In addition, new flags will be introduced soon for the following countries: Uzbekistan, Philippines, Pakistan, Nigeria, Saudi Arabia, Israel, Belarus, Cuba, Nicaragua, Ireland, Ivory Coast, Iran, Italy, Azerbaijan, Armenia, Moldova, Sri Lanka, and Tajikistan.
• The Game Design Team is working on unit balance. We will focus on helicopters and introduce changes to the fleet.

What's the most exciting feature for you?"

If you have {#1440}, as the lobby creator, you can select the battle mode and map. However, without it, you'll be limited to the 1×1 mode on a randomly chosen map.

Round up your friends, enhance your teamwork, experiment with various strategies, and secure those fresh victories."

Фирменный мерч Art of War: выделись из толпы!
"Футболки, майки и свитшоты высочайшего качества с яркими и запоминающимися принтами. Командиры Cопротивления и Конфедерации найдут именно то, что сделает их особенными!

{#80}Важно![-] Промокод подходит только для магазина Printbar. Он не действует на товары внутри игры.

HQ sight range has been increased
"Today, we've increased the sight range of the HQ. For this purpose, we have added extra upgrades. Now, you can build a Shipyard on sea maps without waiting for infantry to scout the coastline. Furthermore, it will be easier for players to spot resource containers near the base.

{#80}Attention![-] New HQ upgrades cost less than upgrades for other buildings. 

Changes:
• {#15020}: 6 new upgrades have been added. Each upgrade increases the HQ sight range by +1 cell.
• Upon reaching the maximum upgrade level, the HQ sight range is increased from 10 to 16 cells.

Tap the button to discuss the news in the official community of AOW3."

Go to our official YouTube channel and have a look at it!"
The way we balance the game
"Players frequently express discontent with the game balance. While some argue that the Confederation faction is overly dominant, others vehemently claim that “the Resistance is completely unbalanced.” Let's delve deeper to ascertain the veracity of these claims.

{#80}What defines perfect balance in AOW3?[-]

It's when both the Confederation and Resistance factions have win rates approaching 50%. This means that about half of the battles are won by Confederation players, while the other half are claimed by the Resistance.

{#80}So, how exactly do you figure out the win rate for each faction?[-]

We've got expert analysts in the game who are on it. They're trained specifically for this task. They collect data online using programs.

{#80}What analytics are we talking about here? Take a look at the Hall of Fame — just one Confederation is dominating it![-] 

The Hall of Fame highlights the achievements of the top players across different competitions, leaving out the vast majority of others, numbering in the thousands. It's misguided to balance the game solely on the performances of the top 20; we need to consider the broader context. And that's precisely what we're doing.

{#80}Why is the Resistance lacking players despite the balance being fair?[-] 

Initially, players pick a faction impulsively, without considering their unique features, as they're unaware of them. Factors like faction description, color, or placement on the screen heavily influence this decision. Surprisingly, statistics reveal that the Confederation is selected 15% more frequently. Consequently, there's an imbalance in faction representation, leading to an increased likelihood of one-faction battles.

{#80}Ooh, which faction is the favorite right now?[-]

Currently, there isn't a clear favorite faction, as both sides are almost evenly matched. Sure, in certain leagues, one faction might have a 4% lead here or there, but overall, it's a pretty balanced game. Take 1vs1 matches, for instance; the Confederation might have a slight advantage, but it's less than 2%, except for the Star League. However, when it comes to team battles like 2vs2 or 3vs3, the Resistance tends to come out on top more often.

{#80}But the tournaments... Like “{#3217}.” It's where the Resistance truly shines![-]

The vast majority of tournaments are equally good for both factions. However, the peculiarities of some tournaments might affect the balance. In Nautilus, for example, the battles rage across the sea where the Resistance reigns supreme. Conversely, in the {#3200} tournament, the Confederation holds the upper hand.

{#80}How do we ensure unit balance in the game?[-]

We assess a player's frequency of using a particular unit along with the outcomes it yields. Take the example of spamming Cyclones. If a player consistently makes ten or more Cyclones, we delve into those battles to gauge their success rate. If we observe that many players employ a similar strategy and emerge victorious, it prompts us to investigate further. We meticulously scrutinize these engagements to pinpoint what gives players an advantage. Perhaps the issue lies not in the unit's power but in its cost or production speed. Only after thoroughly considering all these factors do we tweak the balance, striving to ensure all units are enjoyable to play with.

Got more questions about balance? Feel free to drop them in the comments!"
QIWI-платежи недоступны
"Центральный Банк России отозвал лицензию у QIWI-банка, так что теперь с помощью QIWI оплатить внутриигровые товары не получится. Рекомендуем воспользоваться другими способами оплаты. 
Актуальную информацию о сроках восстановления QIWI-платежей вы найдете на официальном сайте платежного сервиса."

"Greetings, commanders!

{#1010}:
• The base and upon upgrade values of HP have been decreased by 5%;
• The max value of armor upon upgrade is 69 -> 60.

{#1040}:
• The base and upon upgrade values of HP have been decreased by 5%;
• The max value of armor upon upgrade is 76 -> 72.

{#1015}:
• Number of air defense missiles fired per salvo 6 -> 4;
• Air defense missile damage has been increased by 100%.

{#1008}:
• The base and upon upgrade values of damage dealt against all types of armor have been increased by 15%.

{#1038}:
• The base and upon upgrade values of damage dealt against all types of armor have been increased by 20%.

New Feature: {#398}
"Commanders, we're excited to introduce a new feature to the game: ""{#398}."" Now, when a unit is idle and spots a control point within its sight range, it will move to capture it on its own.

{#80}What exactly are control points?[-]

Control points encompass various items like resource containers, flags, Joker boxes, and other objects that units can capture.

{#80}Why simplify the game?[-]

At the beginning of the battle, especially for new players, managing multiple tasks like base-building, army production, and scouting can be overwhelming. Often, a player sends a scout to capture a point, but a unit doesn't get to the capture radius. As a result, an enemy seizes the point. To address this, we've introduced a new option to enhance gameplay, especially in competitions with many control points, such as the ""{#3343}"" blitz tournament for 6 players.

There's no need to update the game to access this feature. Keep in mind that it's automatically enabled for all players, but you can easily disable it in the settings during a battle.

What are your thoughts on this change, commanders? Share in the comments."

Набор в команду ЗБТ!
"Приветствуем, командиры! Приглашаем вас вступить в команду ЗБТ и помочь сделать игру лучше!

Что такое ЗБТ?

ЗБТ — закрытое бета-тестирование. В команду отбираются самые опытные игроки, которые отлично разбираются в игре. Им выдается доступ к новым версиям игры c различными изменениями. ЗБТ-тестеры проверяют правильность работы игры и отправляют обратную связь разработчикам. За проделанную работу тестеры получают игровые предметы.

Тестирование проходят на основном сервере игры и личных аккаунтах. Благодаря работе этой команды игроки получают стабильно работающие версии игры без критических ошибок.

Переходите по кнопке и узнайте подробности."

• In the PvP Lobby, you cannot change the battle mode or opponents. The map is selected randomly during matchmaking.

• Battles can only commence with the lobby leader present as part of the team.
• If your team isn't complete, a random faction member will join your team during matchmaking. Remember to press the ""{#4}"" button. After the timer expires, matchmaking for opponents will begin, and the battle will start.

{#7983} 2024. FAQ
"{#80}What are Thermometers?[-]

In battle, each player has a temperature gauge. The temperature rises every second, and when it hits the max, all your units and buildings start taking damage. To avoid this, collect Cryocapsules that appear on the battlefield occasionally. These Cryocapsules will lower the temperature and heal units in the capture zone.

[i]This mechanic is active only in Tournaments, Blitz Tournaments, and Skirmishes.[/i]

{#80}How to Obtain Cryocapsules?[-]

• Collect them on the battlefield.

Cryocapsules drop in all game modes except PvP, training battles, and campaign missions. In PvP, Cryocapsules are awarded only for a victory, after the battle. Each win will earn you 12 Cryocapsules.

The number of Cryocapsules available during a battle depends on the game mode:

• Tournament — up to 15 Cryocapsules
• Skirmish — up to 10 Cryocapsules
• Blitz Tournament — up to 36 Cryocapsules in FFA4 and up to 24 in FFA3

• Claim them from the Competition reward line.

The more victories you achieve, the more Cryocapsules you can get from the reward line. For example, you will receive 18 Cryocapsules for the first victory in a Tournament and a whopping 48 for the twentieth! With VIP, you will earn even more Cryocapsules.

• Watch ads.
On the contract screen, you can watch ads to receive an additional 4 Cryocapsules.

• Every purchase in the store brings bonus Cryocapsules.
The more expensive the item, the more Cryocapsules you will get!

Click the button to watch a video about the game event!"

• The current Skirmish will end prematurely.
• A new Skirmish will start with the same conditions and on the same map. Since this is a new Competition, the reward line will be updated, and the rankings will be reset.
• If you purchased VIP access in the completed Skirmish, you will receive equivalent VIP access in the new Skirmish.

The FFA Reward Line Doubles in Size
"Greetings, Commanders!

Starting today, FFA format blitz tournaments now have twice as many reward slots.

Here are the changes you can expect for FFA format blitz tournaments:

• The number of reward slots in both the free and VIP lines has been doubled.
• The number of points awarded to fill the reward progress bar has also been doubled.
• The overall value of the reward line will not decrease; in fact, it will slightly increase.

With these changes, all players can claim 50% more rewards from the reward line.

For example, if a player previously earned 3 points for 2nd place in FFA4, they will now earn 6 points, enough to claim one reward. If a player takes 1st place, they will receive 10 points, equivalent to two reward slots.

{#80}Why are these changes necessary?[-]

Previously, only players who finished 1st could earn a reward from the line. Others needed to play at least two battles and finish 2nd to get a single reward. Only a few players can consistently finish 1st, making it difficult to claim the entire reward line.

Have you got questions? Ask them on our social media. Just click the ""{#649}"" button."
Premium Status: Get Rewards Without Watching Ads!
"Greetings, Commanders!

Starting today, players with Premium Status no longer need to watch ads. Just press the button, and you’ll receive your reward instantly! The price of Premium Status remains unchanged.

{#80}What bonuses and rewards can you get?[-]

• Rewards from ad boxes
• An extra reward slot in all boxes, including contract and supply boxes
• Double rewards for daily login
• Getting a Permit to partake in Competitions
• Additional {#2390} in supplies
• Progress on contract completion
• Double rewards for ranking up
• A box for winning a battle

Important! The same limits apply to these rewards and bonuses as when receiving rewards for watching ads.

Save time and get rewards with Premium Status.

Have you got questions? Ask them on our social media. Just click the ""{#649}"" button."
Object 4983 “Data Cell”
"Description: Object 4983 is a metal container shaped like a triangle. Atomic spectrography scans provide some insight into its internal structure. The data storage technologies employed within the container are far more advanced than anything available today.

The container features multiple data interfaces and is thought to hold an immense amount of information, potentially in the petabyte range. The data transmission protocols are not yet understood.

The object has been transferred to the Security Service for data extraction, decryption, and further analysis.

These are just excerpts from the report. To review the full text, click the button below."
Security Service Report, O-1-4983
"Cybersecurity specialists have yet to decrypt the data stored in Object 4983. A detailed analysis of the encryption algorithms indicates the existence of multiple containers identical to Object 4983. This group has been classified as Object 4983-1, ""Data Cells.""

A reliable source from DATA REDACTED confirms that Object 4983-1 contains highly classified information on recent developments from both sides of the conflict. Possessing this information could significantly alter the balance of power in the global war.

Given the strategic importance of this information, previous objectives have been revised. Object 4983-1 is now the highest priority.

Orders to commanders: bring your troops to combat readiness."
Security Service Report, O-2-4983
"Intelligence reports indicate a growing number of instances of Object 4983-1, “Data Cells.” Significant enemy movements have been detected in these regions, raising concerns of possible interference from DATA CORRUPTED.

It has been confirmed that Object 4983-1 contains strategically critical classified information. Cybersecurity specialists are strongly urging the collection of as many samples as possible for further decryption.

Orders to all commanders: prepare to deploy to conflict zones within the next 24 hours. Your mission is to ensure that no Object 4983-1 samples fall into enemy hands."

{#50199}. Stage 1: Resistance Wins
"Despite intense assaults from the Confederation, Resistance forces successfully captured a large cluster of Data Cells in the Middle East and East Africa. Rebel technicians decrypted the data within the Cells, leading to an enhancement in the performance of the Mammoths. Their cannons are now deadlier and have a faster rate of fire.

{#80}{#1038}[-]: The base value of the rate of fire was increased by 15%.

This victory commences a new stage in the battle for Data Cells. Fierce combat is taking place all around the globe. Commanders, keep fighting for your faction!

The second stage will continue until September 6th, 8:59 AM (UTC). To view the details of the competition between factions, click the button below."
{#50199}. Stage 2: Confederation Wins
"Despite repeated attacks from the Resistance, the Confederation successfully gathered and analyzed a significant number of Data Cells in North America. This data has been used to enhance the {#1008} missiles by increasing the range of their launchers.

{#80}{#1008}[-]: The base value of the firing range was increased by 1 cell.

Scouts from both factions have discovered new Data Cells in Asia, and forces from both sides are converging on the battlefield. Orders: All commanders are to immediately join the fight for their faction—the new stage has begun!

The third stage will continue until September 9th, 8:59 AM (UTC). To view the details of the competition between factions, click the button below."
{#50199}. Stage 3: Confederation Wins
"The Resistance forces moved too late, allowing the Confederation to gather a significant number of Data Cells and claim victory in China. Now, Confederation scientists are developing upgraded jump jets for their {#1002}[-].

{#80}{#1002}[-]: jetpack movement speed was increased by 30%.

The conflict is now shifting to Siberia, where new bases near Data Cell concentrations around Tunguska are attracting the attention of both factions. Commanders, the next stage is starting. March toward victory!

The fourth stage will continue until September 11th, 8:59 AM (UTC). To view the details of the competition between factions, click the button below."
{#50199}. Stage 4: Resistance Wins
"After relentless attacks from the Resistance, the Confederation forces were left drained, despite their best efforts to maintain supply lines. Without support from heavy units and air forces, the regional command decided to retreat to save their troops.

This allowed the Resistance to gain access to the Data Cells in Siberia. With the decrypted data, their technicians upgraded the infantry's gear.

{#80}Resistance Infantry[-]: forest movement speed penalty was reduced by 33%.

The Confederation's defeat in Siberia has put other battlefronts at risk. In Eastern Europe, several countries have erupted in large-scale armed uprisings. It’s no surprise that new Data Cells have been found in these regions. Elite commanders from both factions have already been dispatched to the conflict zones.

The fifth stage will continue until September 13th, 8:59 AM (UTC). To view the details of the competition between factions, click the button below."
{#50199}. Stage 5: Confederation Wins
"The European theater of war has seen significant shifts. Despite the Resistance's efforts, the Confederation secured several key victories and captured more Data Cells.

Urban battles revealed that the {#1017} bayonet wasn’t as effective as needed. However, new data and advancements by Confederation scientists are set to fix that.

{#80}{#1017}[-]: bayonet damage was increased by 25% against the first type of armor.

This stage is over, but the battle for Data Cells continues. Stay strong and keep fighting, Commander!

The sixth stage will continue until September 16th, 8:59 AM (UTC). To view the details of the competition between factions, click the button below."
{#50199}. Stage 6: Resistance Wins
"The decisive battle in Peru ended the conflict in South America. Once again, the Confederation has suffered defeat in this country, allowing the Resistance to gain the upper hand and collect more Data Cells.

With their technicians’ efforts, the Resistance successfully decrypted enough data to enhance their technology, increasing the range of the {#1048} turrets.

{#80}{#1048}[-]: turret firing range was increased by 1 cell.

While the fight for Data Cells continues, the final stage is approaching. Intelligence reports suggest that the rate of new Data Cells appearing is slowing down.

The last Data Cells are expected to appear on September 18, 2024."
Faction Battle
"Greetings, Commanders!

Join the fight, collect Data Cells, and lead either the Resistance or the Confederation to victory! The faction that gathers the most Data Cells will earn upgrades for their units or heroes. Every Data Cell collected contributes to your faction’s total.

Factions will compete for these upgrades throughout the entire event, which consists of several stages. Winning a stage grants your faction an upgrade. You’ll learn which upgrade your faction receives at the end of each stage.

The first stage is already underway and will run until September 5th, 8:59 am UTC.

Data Cells are counted separately for each stage.

{#80}How can you help your faction win?[-]
• Collect Data Cells on the battlefield in the Tournament, Skirmish, and Blitz Tournament
• Earn Data Cells from the line of competition rewards, including the VIP line 
• Play PvP matches (1v1, 2v2, 3v3) and earn Data Cells for victories
• Purchase items in the in-game store

To stay updated on the start of new stages, follow us on social media. We’ll keep you informed about the battle’s progress and the upgrades the winning faction earns.

Have questions? Drop them in the comments!"

"В этом сражении у вас будет до 5 динамичных раундов. В каждом следующем раунде на базе появляются более высокотехнологичные производящие здания. Победитель определяется в последнем раунде по наибольшему количеству очков. Очки начисляются за захват флагов и их удержание.

{#80}• {#3210}[-]
{#80}• {#62149}[-]"
Набрать наибольшее количество победных очков
• Unit production, building upgrade, and construction got accelerated.
• Запрещено строить супероружие и стены. Невозможно строительство зданий рядом с флагом.
• Если в 4 раунде у лидирующих игроков одинаковое количеств очков, они играют решающий раунд с 1 флагом. Остальные игроки проигрывают.

Take command of infantry, armor, ships, and aircraft!
Create a unique and invincible army!
Epic real-time PvP and co-op battles
Two different factions, each with their own unique features
The only true multiplayer RTS with direct control for mobile
Unite with your friends in a clan and conquer the world!
A huge campaign for each faction
This unique mobile RTS game is like no other. Fight and win in PvP battles! AOW3
"А unique classic real-time strategy game with direct control for true commanders! For those who are not afraid to face the enemy in real-time PvP battles! For those who want to feel the thrill of a victory over a live opponent! For those who can think like a strategist and act decisively in any battlefield situation! It is not a place for the weak! 

Are you ready for that, commander?

Art of War 3: Global Conflict (AOW) - is a real-time strategy online game in the best tradition of old classic PC RTS games. Command, conquer and defeat your enemy on the battlefield! In this modern warfare game, you have to fight with other players in PvP battles, invent new combat tactics, develop your victorious strategies, and upgrade infantry, assault vehicles, tanks, navy, and air force to achieve supremacy over the enemy in battle.

The action takes place in the near future. The world is engulfed by a global conflict between two warring factions - the Confederation and the Resistance. Choose your side and fight shoulder to shoulder with other commanders to win in this World War. Take the side of the Confederation and protect the world from the red alert. Join the rebels and crush the global domination system."
"• Epic real-time PvP and cooperative battles.
• Thousands of players online from all over the world! 
• Classical RTS direct control system. You can control each unit directly!
• Stunningly detailed 3D graphics will provide you with full immersion.
• A variety of units and tactical abilities allow you to invent different victorious strategies.
• Two warring factions, each with their own features, unique combat units, strengths, and weaknesses.
• А big number of unit and building upgrades gives you ample opportunities to create your own unique and victorious army.
• Continuous World War in which the clans fight each other for global domination.
• А huge campaign for each faction, including dozens of hours of game time."
"This online, real-time, (RTS) modern war strategy game gives you the opportunity to feel like a battlefield general. Command, conquer, build your base, train infantry, produce tanks and armored vehicles, warplanes, and warships to defeat the enemy. Take part in the World War. Use superweapons and unleash your power! Join a clan with your friends and fight other clans to dominate the world. Bring your enemies to total annihilation!

We need you, general!

Art of War 3: Global Conflict is a multiplayer online game. It requires a constant, stable internet connection."

Earn War Points and receive supplies
Supplies are the sequence of supply cases, which can be obtained by earning War Points.
War Points can be obtained for:
"Battles
Quests
Contracts"
Get into a higher league
By reaching higher leagues you will increase amount of supply cases (and reward in them) you receive.

Get into a higher league and receive more rewards through the promotion of your rank.
Complete contracts and receive rewards
Contracts are a series of quests. Completing them will bring you:
You can change the contract for {0} by clicking on the button {1}
For the completion of a series of 5 contracts you get a special crate.
Лиги
В соревнованиях все игроки разбиваются по лигам.
"В каждой лиге формируется свой рейтинг с победителями. 
Награды за призовые места в рейтинге зависят от соревнования и лиги."
Available technology
Command has allocated research grants
Boost upgrades with a 30% discount
ONLY 2 DAYS!

SUMMER HEAT
Don't miss this hot summer offer!
THE FINAL SUMMER OFFER

Tournaments reveal the strongest and the most experienced commanders.
Each tournament has its conditions of victory.
Tournaments last 1-2 weeks. During this time, you should win as many battles as possible to receive the maximum amount of Tournament Points. 
In Tournament, all players are divided into Leagues. Each League has its own winners who have scored the most Tournament Points.
For each victory in Tournament you receive Skill Сards (SC), needed for Commander Skill improvement in the Profile menu.
Турнир может включать в себя несколько этапов: Подготовительный, Основной и Завершающий. Бои турнира проводятся по расписанию. Набор заявок начинается за 5 минут до начала битвы.
Во время Подготовительного этапа вы можете сражаться с другими игроками на турнирных картах. Эти бои не приносят ОС и не требуют Билетов.
В ходе Основного этапа ваша задача — сыграть как можно больше боёв и набрать наибольшее количество ОС. Чем длиннее победная серия, тем больше ОС вы получите за каждую следующую победу.
Во время Завершающего этапа подводятся итоги Соревнования, и игроки получают награды за призовые места в рейтинге.

Скирмиш — регулярное соревнование, в котором два игрока сражаются вместе против бота. Скирмиш длится от нескольких дней до нескольких недель.
В Скирмише все игроки разбиваются по лигам. В каждой лиге определяются свои победители, показавшие лучшее время.
В Скирмише действует Боевой пропуск (БП) — линейка наград. Она состоит из платной и бесплатной частей. Лучшее время конвертируется в Очки Боевого пропуска (ОБП), которые заполняют шкалу и разблокируют награды.
Каждый игрок может подать заявку на Скирмиш или вызвать напарника, используя Билеты.
Upgrade levels and difficulty of the AI-bot are defined by the rank of the strongest player in the pair.
Skirmish battles have a chat for team coordination. Act harmoniously, cooperate with allies and win!


"Friend list is used to: 
Make communication easier

Call friends into training battles

Invite friends to co-op skirmish and 2vs2 battles"

Receive Сlan Supplies together with your clanmates
Clan Supplies are the sequence of Supply Cases that can be obtained by War Points earned by all clanmates. A clan leader opens each case twice.
War Points for the Clan can be obtained in: 
"Battles
Contracts"
Every Clan Supply series lasts 2 weeks. The amount of Supply cases depends on overall Clan activity.
In a new Supply series, the Clan will obtain one case more than was opened in the previous Supply series.
If the Clan has opened all cases in the previous Supply series, it will receive an additional case in the new series, and the rewards in the cases will be increased.
Get more Clan Supply cases! 
Minimum number of cases in a Сlan Supply: {#80}• 5[-]

Commander Skills increase both combat and non-combat characteristics of your profile.
Skills have 3 levels of rarity according to their importance: common, rare and epic.
To improve Skills, you need credits and Skill Cards. They can be obtained in:
Commander Skill Series
А Skill becomes available for improvement if all previous Skills related to it are improved.
Skills combined into Series. To access the next Series, improve the required number of Skills in the current Series.
Improve all the Skills in the Series to get a reward for the Skill Series completion.

Unlocked: Commander Skills
Commander Skills increase both combat and non-combat characteristics of your profile.
Collect Skill Cards, improve Skills, and become stronger!
Get your first case with Skill Cards

Skill Points were replaced with Skill Cards of different rarity
Many new Skills were added
New Skills which affect non-battle characteristics
We made sure that the transition to the new system was pleasant for all players.

In the Workshop, {#83}Heroes[-] are available — special units with advanced abilities!
Each {#83}Hero is unique[-] and produced in a single copy.
"To produce the Hero, it must {#83}be activated in a battle[-].
Activation requires {#83}Uranum[-]."
Complete the tasks of the command to unlock the first Hero right now!
A higher class for heroes is available!
Uranum is used to {#83}activate Heroes in battle[-].
After activation, the Hero is produced for resources and CP.
"Uranum restores:

• Automatically on a timer
• With the use of {#83}Batteries[-]"
Heroes have three levels of rarity.
Each Hero requires his own unique {#83}Blueprints[-].
The Hero's unique abilities
The Hero slot is not activated
The Hero is activated and available for production
The Hero can only be activated in
A tap on the Uranum indicator opens the window to restore.
Batteries can be purchased for golden credits during a battle.

{#91}Active ability[-] can change the course of a battle.
The ability is activated with a button.
The indicator shows the сooldown time.
{#91}Passive ability[-] is applied automatically when the conditions are fulfilled.
For example, when taking damage.
{#91}The blue indicator[-] shows the сooldown time.
Number of Hero blueprints required to upgrade a class

{#80}Соревнования[-] — это игровые режимы с ограниченным количеством боёв, которые нужно сыграть за отведённое время.
"Соревнования длятся от нескольких дней до нескольких недель. 

Чтобы победить и получить награду за призовые места в рейтинге, вы должны добиться лучшего результата. У каждого соревнования свои правила формирования рейтинга."
В турнире все игроки разбиваются по лигам. В каждой лиге определяются свои победители, набравшие наибольшее количество ОС. За каждую победу в соревнованиях вы получаете Карты Умений, необходимые для улучшения Умений Командира в Профиле.
В Турнирах действует Боевой пропуск (БП) — линейка наград. Она состоит из из платной и бесплатной частей. ОС конвертируются в Очки Боевого Пропуска (ОБП), которые заполняют шкалу и разблокируют награды.
